explains: adj. 撒木屑的；无实质的
vt. 在……上撒木屑；用木屑填塞

sentences.en: The smell of sawdust and glue pervaded the factory.
sentences.cn: 锯屑和胶水的气味弥漫在工厂里。

sentences.en: He bought an aquarium, installed the wipers in it, filled the tank with a mixture of oil and sawdust to simulate a load on the wiper.
sentences.cn: 他买了一个养鱼缸，在上面安装了雨刷，并填充了油和锯末的混合物，以模拟负载的雨刷器。

sentences.en: The humankind can culture shii-take with sawdust.
sentences.cn: 人们可以用木屑栽培香菇。
